title: Hour 2 - More Saban vs. Fisher, PGA Championship and Phil Mickelson's Absence
itunes:title: Hour 2 - More Saban vs. Fisher, PGA Championship and Phil Mickelson's Absence
description:
Dan continues the conversation about Nick Saban's dispute with Jimbo Fisher, and asks if Texas A&M cheated or bought its recruiting class. He also talks with Alan Shipnuck about Phil Mickelson's turbulent year.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
